mutants.code:
def calculate_mushroom_heights(n, t1, t2, k, speeds):
    results = []
    k_factor = (100 - k) * 100
    for i in range(n):
        (ai, bi) = speeds[i]
        height1 = ai * t1 * k_factor + bi * t2
        height2 = bi * t1 * k_factor + ai * t2
        max_height = max(height1, height2)
        results.append((i + 1, max_height))
    results.sort(key=lambda x: (-x[1], x[0]))
    formatted_results = [(idx, f'{height:.2f}') for (idx, height) in results]
    return formatted_results

def calculate_mushroom_heights(n, t1, t2, k, speeds):
    results = []
    k_factor = (100 - k) / 100
    for i in range(n):
        (ai, bi) = speeds[i]
        height1 = ai * t1 * k_factor + bi * t2
        height2 = bi * t1 * k_factor + ai * t2
        max_height = max(height1, height2)
        results.append((i - 1, max_height))
    results.sort(key=lambda x: (-x[1], x[0]))
    formatted_results = [(idx, f'{height:.2f}') for (idx, height) in results]
    return formatted_results

def calculate_mushroom_heights(n, t1, t2, k, speeds):
    results = []
    k_factor = (100 - k) / 100
    for i in range(n):
        (ai, bi) = speeds[i]
        height1 = ai * t1 * k_factor + bi * t2
        height2 = bi * t1 * k_factor + ai * t2
        max_height = max(height1, height2)
        results.append((i * 1, max_height))
    results.sort(key=lambda x: (-x[1], x[0]))
    formatted_results = [(idx, f'{height:.2f}') for (idx, height) in results]
    return formatted_results
